services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Experience ultimate relaxation with our traditional Thai techniques

traditional.name: Traditional Thai Body Care
traditional.description: Often called "two-person yoga," this traditional Thai stretching realigns the body and mind.

oil.name: Aroma Oil Treatment
oil.description: A gentle treatment using natural aromatic oils to care for the entire body.

face.name: Facial Treatment
face.description: Luxurious facial care using natural ingredients for beautiful and healthy skin.

foot.name: Foot Reflexology
foot.description: Stimulate foot reflex zones to promote overall well-being and relaxation.

cta.disclaimer: *This service is for relaxation and beauty purposes, not for medical treatment.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Authentic Thai Techniques
about.description: At Leelawadee, our experienced practitioners, trained in Thailand, offer traditional Thai care with a 2,500-year history. Through unique techniques combining yoga and stretching, we aim to balance your mind and body, promoting deep relaxation.

authentic.title: Authentic Techniques
authentic.description: Authentic care by practitioners with Thai-certified qualifications

environment.title: Healing Space
environment.description: A calm interior recreating a traditional Thai atmosphere

testimonial.text: The chronic tension in my shoulders felt wonderfully relieved after just one session. I was impressed by the practitioner's skill and care. I will definitely be back.
testimonial.author: Ms. Tanaka (Female, 40s)
